definition[0]: a piece of underwear without sleeves that you wear on the top half of your body
definition[1]: a piece of special clothing without sleeves that you wear over your clothes to protect your body
definition[2]: a piece of clothing without sleeves and with buttons down the front that you wear as part of a suit
definition[4]: if shares, stocks etc are vested, they are owned by someone
example[1]: About one-third of these options are vested and can be exercised by shareholders at any time.
